name: Molton Brown
description: Energizing blend of citrus fruits, perfect for a fresh start to your day.

name: Hugo Boss Elixir-Parfum
description: Refreshing like a breeze from the sea, with notes of citrus and marine.

name: Xerloff
description: Luxurious scent of velvety roses with hints of amber and vanilla.

name: Tom Ford Ombre-leather
description: A mysterious blend of orchid and musk, perfect for evenings.

name: D&G: the only One
description: Dive into a fantasy enriched with hints of lavender and sage.

name: Chanel Bleu de Chanel
description: A woody aromatic fragrance for the man who defies convention.

name: Dior Sauvage
description: A radically fresh composition, raw and noble all at once.

name: Armani Code Profumo
description: An intense, long-lasting and captivating fragrance for men.

name: YSL La Nuit de l'Homme
description: A fragrance full of contrasts, deep and mysterious.
